Name: ACDSee
View functions: Thumbnails (user-defined sizes), fullscreen, slideshow, zoom, fit, view Exif info, view inside ZIP archives, ...
Other functions: Resize, crop, rotate, flip, JPEG lossless rotate/mirror, face recognition, adjust exposure and colors etc., filters (sharpen, blur, average, emboss), red eye removal, batch rename, edit Exif info

Name: Adobe Bridge
View functions: Thumbnails, slideshow, filmstrip, preview, versions with alternates
Other functions: Stand Alone: rotate, rename, delete, move, copy, batch rename, add/Edit Metadata, camera raw image adjustments: crop, resize, exposure, contrast, white balance, curves Via Photoshop: contact sheet, merge to HDR, PDF presentation, Photomerge, Web picture gallery

Name: Adobe Photoshop Lightroom
View functions: Library organization, RAW and JPEG editing, slideshow tools, print layout and preferences, web gallery creation and uploading

Name: CDisplay
View functions: Fit to window, zoom, print, full-screen, slideshow, image collection, image information...
Other functions: Rotate, flip, save as, used for reading comics and manga.

Name: Comix
View functions: Fit to window, zoom, rotate, full-screen, image collection, image information...
Other functions: Manga mode, double page view

Name: digiKam
View functions: Fit to window, zoom, pan, Light Table, Slideshow+Effects, OpenGL viewer
Other functions: Rotate, crop, vertical/horizontal flip, lossless JPEG operations (90° steps), color management, 16bit color depth, Light Table, Exif, IPTC, XMP, GPS metadata, adjust colors/brightness/levels, elaborate Black and White conversion, automatic lens correction, anti-vignetting, sharpening tools, vibrance, many filters, Batch operations, export to archive, HTML, flickr, gallery2, picasaweb, smugmug, iPod, Facebook, 23hq, flash.

Name: Eye of GNOME
View functions: Fit to window, zoom, flip, rotate, full-screen, slideshow, image collection, image information
Other functions: Delete, print, save, rename, set wallpaper

Name: FastPictureViewer
View functions: Borderless full-screen kiosk mode, Fit-to-window, 1:1, 50% to 6400% magnifier, multicore-enabled, GPU-based panning/zooming, black & white preview and lost shadows/highlights view.
Other functions: File renaming. Single-click background copy/move to preset location, single-click rating/labeling (writes Adobe XMP sidecar files and/or embeds XMP metadata within JPEG/TIFF/HD Photo/JPEG XR), Windows rating, Color management including custom target profile selection, Unicode support, Exif shooting data (shutter speed, f-stop, ISO speed, exposure compensation) and real-time, seamless R,G,B histogram in translucent floating window. IPTC metadata editor in the registered version.

Name: FastStone Image Viewer
View functions: All major formats, thumbnail view (5 predefined sizes), full screen, magnifier, slideshow. Uses second monitor for fullscreen preview. Popups image galery, detailed image informations, editing options at the image border in fullscreen modus.
Other functions: Many editing features: rotate, move, rename, 150+ transitional effects, crop, resize, clone, heal, convert format, color adjust, sharpen, drop shadow effects, scanner support, histogram

Name: F-Spot
View functions: Full-screen, slideshow, zoom, multiple sizes of thumbnails. Export: HTML, Flickr, Gallery Project, Picasa, Facebook (via extension) and O.r.i.g.i.n.a.l
Other functions: Tags, rotate in single degree increments, hue, contrast, white balance, colour, sharpen, soft focus, crop, auto red-eye reduction. Files stored at /user/Pictures/Photos/[year]/[month]/[day]

Name: Geeqie
View functions: Full-screen, slideshow, zoom, color spectrum, 14 sizes of thumbnails
Other functions: Rotate, move, rename, hue, contrast, find/remove duplicates

Name: Gonvisor
View functions: Fit to window, zoom, print, full-screen, slideshow, image collection, image information, view images in compressed ZIP, RAR, or 7z files.
Other functions: Rotate, flip, save as, used for reading comics and manga

Name: GraphicConverter
View functions: Full-screen, slideshow
Other functions: Rotate, move, rename

Name: gThumb
View functions: Full-screen, slideshow, zoom, color spectrum, three sizes of thumbnails
Other functions: Rotate, move, rename, hue, contrast

Name: Gwenview
View functions: Fullscreen, slideshow, zoom, rotate, adjust gamma/contrast/brightness, disk navigator, file tree, thumbnails, extended thumbnails, bookmarks...
Other functions: Add border, filter, effects, resize, rename, raw image converter, recompress, edit color. Share using 23, Dropbox, Facebook, Flickr, Google drive, Google photos/Picasaweb, Imageshack, Imgur, Piwigo, Rajce.net, remote storage, SmugMug, Yandex.Fotki, Zooomr

Name: iPhoto
View functions: Thumbnails, fullscreen, slideshow, camera information, search, tags, organize by event or album, auto organize by date during first import
Other functions: Lossless JPEG rotate, Cropping (custom and template), Brightness/Contrast, Red-eye, Retouch, Color Enhancement, B&W and Sepia Conversion, Export to multiple format & size

Name: IrfanView
View functions: Thumbnails (18 pre-defined sizes from 50×50–800×800 pixels), fullscreen, slideshow, zoom, fit (several options), view IPTC and Exif info, hex view, histogram (also RGB)
Other functions: Format detection with offer to rename, set wallpaper, EXE/SCR creation, Burn slideshow to CD
column5: Add Text, Crop, Cut/Copy selected area, Paste-Into selected area, paste from PrintScreen, Resize/Resample, Rotate, Flip Vert/Horiz, JPEG lossless transformations, Color Adjustments, change color depth, Greyscale, Red-Eye Reduction, Sharpen, effects/filters, Own and 8bf (Photoshop) plugins compatibility, insert text, edit IPTC info, Move, Copy, Delete, Rename, Convert, batch conversion, batch renaming/resizing/cropping, panorama creation, send email via IrfanView Thumbnails/Plugins: contact sheet creation, thumbnail creation, web gallery creation, face detection

Name: Lphoto

Name: Microsoft Photos
